derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: representing medieval Latin tragonia and tarchon, perhaps from an Arabic alteration of Greek drakōn 'dragon' (by association with drakontion 'dragon arum')

entry.def: Tarragon is a European herb with narrow leaves which are used to add flavour to food.

means.word_mean: 2. fresh leaves (or leaves preserved in vinegar) used as seasoning
